name: persistentvolumestatus-v1
description: ResourceQuota sets aggregate quota restrictions enforced per namespace

message.description: A human-readable message indicating details about why the volume is in this state.

phase.description: Phase indicates if a volume is available, bound to a claim, or released by a claim. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#phase

reason.description: Reason is a brief CamelCase string that describes any failure and is meant for machine parsing and tidy display in the CLI.
